name: js-framework-house
description: house for building all your projects

scripts.angular: test() { bash -c 'trap "echo hi;" EXIT; run(){ if [ ! -d xx ]; then ng new xx; fi; cd xx; ng serve --open;}; run xx;';}; test
scripts.vue: run(){ if [ ! -d $1 ]; then vue create $1; fi; cd $1; npm run serve;}; run
